subject: Re: my messy new vid on utube
author: jamietreetalker
full_text:
Nice one! It's sad that Troy had to suffer like that, but he's free now. 
Jamie

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> I got to redo this vid, it's terrible, no expert here, just go listen to  
> it, there are a few things toward the end you can understand, a few words, I  
> really had trouble understand what he was saying when i posted it, the 
> words  change some times. sf
>  
> Troy, was found "innocent in Heaven" and Troy is in the light, I did some  
> spirit files, here is what I got, he wants his family to know, "I'm 
> innocent, I  love them, and I got in the light, I have an angel, he looks like me 
> and he is  black, tell them I love them, and call my bar and let him know"  I 
> think he  is talking about his lawyer, when I get better files, I will post 
> them.  
>  
> _http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QkO_H7GW-_8_ 
> (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QkO_H7GW-_8)
>
